article_title: Russian Separatists In Ukraine Are Nostalgic For The Soviet Union

article_metadata.author: Capital Flows

og.description: Who are these separatists in southeastern Ukraine? Russian troops in disguise? Kremlin stooges? Radical right-wingers? American media have so far contented themselves with calling the separatists "pro-Russian." But the term is misleading.
og.title: Russian Separatists In Ukraine Are Nostalgic For The Soviet Union
